title: Melbourne Escape near St Kilda Beach with Daily Breakfast & Late Checkout
description:
Seek out the bold and vibrant lifestyle of Melbourne’s St Kilda neighbourhood, bursting with art, culture and music with a stay at the Crest on Barkly Hotel. You'll be minutes away from the quirky cafes of Fitzroy Street and just a short stroll along the palm-fringed esplanade to the iconic St Kilda Pier.

A trip to St Kilda isn’t complete without a visit to the historic Luna Park, and when hunger strikes, the onsite Mr Hide Bar & Grill serves up modern Australian dishes, while Saint Evie boasts an extensive menu of crafty cocktails and Asian-inspired cuisine.
offer_address: 47 Barkly Street, St Kilda, Victoria 3182, Australia

title: Trendy Melbourne Escape near St Kilda Beachfront with Daily Breakfast & Late Checkout
description: Seek out the bold and vibrant lifestyle of Melbourne’s St Kilda neighbourhood, bursting with art, culture and music with a stay at the Crest on Barkly Hotel Melbourne. You'll be minutes away from the fine dining and quirky cafes of Fitzroy Street or step out for a stroll along the palm-fringed esplanade leading you to the iconic St Kilda Pier. A trip to St Kilda isn’t complete without a visit to the historic Luna Park for a day of laughter or a wander through the lush grounds of Albert Park. When hunger bites, the onsite Mr Hide Bar & Grill serves up modern Australian dishes, while Saint Evie Cafe and Bar boast an extensive menu of crafty cocktails and Asian-inspired cuisine.
offer_address: 47 Barkly Street, St Kilda, Victoria 3182, Australia
